docs.lead_paragraph: TIME was when every living supertwin -- that means every triplet, quadruplet, quintuplet and sextuplet in the world -- could count on a birthday card from Miss Helen Kirk. In 1939, when Miss Helen, as the Galveston, Tex., dowager always calls herself, was a young medical assistant to a doctor who delivered a set of quadruplets, she began recording multiple births and writing to the parents as a hobby.

docs.section_name: Home and Garden; Education; Health; Style

docs.lead_paragraph: Clerical workers at Yale University went on strike this morning, setting up picket lines that led many professors to hold classes off campus in churches, movie theaters and private homes. The walkout came less than a month after graduate teaching assistants abandoned a job action involving the withholding of students' grades. They had begun the action in an attempt to win recognition for their union, but they did not succeed.

headline.main: Yale Clerical Workers Strike as Talks Stall
